title: Studio
subtitle: Contemporary and Innovative
text:
DPO Sound Design is a Copenhagen-based studio focusing on  contemporary music production and innovative sound design. The studio, founded in 2017, is owned and operated by Daniel Porcelli. Porcelli is currently finishing a Bachelor of Arts in Media Sonic Communication / Sound Design.

DPO Sound Design specialises in producing cinematic music, modern sound design and audio branding for advertising, film, trailers, art and video games.

At DPO Sound Design we strive to surpass our clients expectations. For info and pricing, please get in touch for a chat and a personal quote.
